name: Lightworks Data File
summary: Learn about .LWD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LWD file are located in the following directory: C:\​Program Files\​Lightworks They're also found in the "DSX" folder inside the "Lightworks" folder.

description: File used by Lightworks; a video editing application; contains data that is referenced by the application in order to operate; includes codec, video effects, and driver information.
